definitions.definition: Executed in the manner of a master ; showing competence and skill ; masterful .
examples: Her years of experience enabled her to render a masterly performance.

definitions.definition: Like a master ; arbitrary ; domineering , imperious .

main_definition: Executed in the manner of a master ; showing competence and skill ; masterful .
secondary_definitions: ( usually derogatory , obsolete ) Like a master ; arbitrary ; domineering , imperious .
